page.title: 09Balmullo Gala Day Floats
page.content: On the actual day, lorries are decorated by various clubs in the village and there is a procession of the "floats" around the neighbourhood. Prizes are awarded to the three floats which are judged to be the most imaginative or amusing. This year, the Cub Scouts' float won. The theme was "Johnson's Babies" and they all dressed up as babies in a playpen! You can imagine how funny it was to spot our eight to eleven- year old classmates wearing nappies and bonnets and waving rattles, teddies and dummies! Our school float had a theme of Twentieth Century Fashion and our parents helped us to make outfits to represent different times during this century. We had everything from Edwardian ladies to Punks!
